mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stockInfo (itmsNm, mrktCtg, clpr, fltRt, mkp, basDt, hipr, lopr, trqu, mrktTotAmt,srtnCd) VALUES (#{itmsNm}, #{mrktCtg}, #{clpr},#{fltRt},#{mkp},#{basDt}, #{hipr},#{lopr},#{trqu},#{mrktTotAmt},#{srtnCd}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE itmsNm=#{itmsNm}, mrktCtg= #{mrktCtg},clpr=#{clpr},fltRt=#{fltRt}, mkp=#{mkp},basDt=#{basDt},hipr=#{hipr},lopr=#{lopr},trqu=#{trqu},mrktTotAmt=#{mrktTotAmt},srtnCd=#{srtnCd};
